definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: The results of disassembling or disposal must be reported to AEC for inspection.
sentences.chinese: 其拆除及處理結果，應報由原子能委員會檢查。

definition: to make a report after the event/to make a supplementary report/to repay a kindness
to be in overall charge/to oversee
to apply for (a subsidy, unemployment benefit etc)
to get out of trouble/to escape from danger/a danger appears/threatened by danger
to relieve sb of his post/to sack/to demote/dismissal/sacking
to visit a prisoner (usu. a relative or friend)
Fabi, first currency issued by the 國民黨|国民党[Guo2 min2 dang3] in 1935, in use until 1948
security measures (esp. border security)/official seal (esp. military seal during Qing and Ming times)
